channel.title: Marina Tycoon on
channel.description: Recent content in Marina Tycoon on

item.title: Youda Marina
item.description:
Youda Marina is a great simulation game where your role is to be the Harbour master.Thou, you are responsible to keep all your visitors happy, which will grant you loads of income which comes from harbour fees and the money spent on bars, restaurants and others atractions you´ll be able to build later in the game.

Your goal is either to simply have fun building and developing your marina, the way you like, or achieving the smaller goals you´ll have during the game until you reach the major final goal. Do you feel ready?
